Package com.rgl

package com.rgl
This is the root package for the Game Tracker application.

It contains core classes and interfaces that define the primary structure of the application. Other packages, such as GameGUI, gametracker, and jsonutility, are included as sub-packages for handling specific functionality related to the user interface, game data, and JSON handling.

Core functionality: - The application tracks and manages game data. - It provides a graphical user interface for interacting with the game data. - The application persists game data using JSON files.

  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    com.rgl.gamedata
    Contains classes related to game data representation.
    com.rgl.gamegui
    Contains classes related to the Game Tracker application's graphical user interface (GUI) and game data management.
    com.rgl.helpers
    Contains utility classes for supporting various application functionalities.
    com.rgl.jsonutility
    Contains classes related to JSON data handling and persistence.
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    Main
    Main entry point for the Game Tracker application.
